email_text:
Subject: Urgent: Temporary Account Suspension Notice

Dear Valued Customer,

We regret to inform you that due to suspicious activity detected on your Bank of America account, we have no choice but to temporarily suspend your account to prevent any further unauthorized access.

In order to restore access to your account, we kindly ask you to verify your account information by clicking on the link below and following the instructions provided. Failure to do so may result in permanent suspension of your account.

Click here to verify your account: [Phishing link]

Please be assured that the security of your account is our top priority and we apologize for any inconvenience this may cause. Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter.

Sincerely,
Bank of America Security Team
